fields.title: Preparing for Submission
fields.content:
To prepare the project for submission, go through the following steps using the side panel:

  1. Invite authors to be credited for creating the resource.
  2. Fill in the descriptive metadata.
  3. Set the access policy and license.
  4. Add discovery information.
  5. Upload the files.
  6. Proofread the project and make sure it is ready for submission.

The full publishing process is described in the author guidelines.
